definition: A person who works in a protected natural area, responsible for maintaining its conservation, enforcing regulations, and ensuring the safety and well-being of visitors. They typically patrol the park, provide information to visitors, and may also participate in wildlife management and rescue operations.

examples.german: Der Parkranger patrouilliert regelmäßig durch den Nationalpark.
examples.english: The park ranger patrols the national park regularly.

examples.german: Der Parkranger kümmert sich um den Schutz der Tier- und Pflanzenwelt.
examples.english: The park ranger takes care of the protection of the wildlife and plants.

examples.german: Der Parkranger informiert die Besucher über die Regeln im Park.
examples.english: The park ranger informs the visitors about the rules in the park.

examples.german: Der Parkranger führt Wandergruppen durch den Wald.
examples.english: The park ranger guides hiking groups through the forest.

examples.german: Der Parkranger sorgt für die Sicherheit der Besucher.
examples.english: The park ranger ensures the safety of the visitors.
